Articles.Content:
It's a black hole/wormhole?

- - - Updated - - -

Also, I have to command entire FLEETS!
I'm firing Kinemetic warheads into the fighters..... Shrapnel should get them
I just don't have the patience for this office job. I like lasers and fighting wars.

One of the destroyers is in my sights..... Main lasers primed.... Got em'.

Firing warheads at the remaining destroyers
Impossible! Laythe, incoming battleships!, We are coming alongside your ship, get those fighters off my six!

Whoa! The lasers just bounced off! Their hulls must be made of Kinemet!

- - - Updated - - -

Ejecting debris at the fighters.... 3 crashed

- - - Updated - - -

Main phaser array armed..... I got the fighters
can I pleeeeease shoot this diplomat? to relieve stress?
I have a theory about that, but we can talk about that later! Approaching station!
Wha... Oh my....... Is that a ship, or a planet?....

> 
> can I pleeeeease shoot this diplomat? to relieve stress?

NO, you shoot one of them, that is reason enough for a diplomatic crisis, we have enough problems as it is!

> 
> Wha... Oh my....... Is that a ship, or a planet?....

[Physics please!]
he's whining a stray laser vaporized his favorite toolshed.

ALERT: UNKNOWN RADIATION SIGNATURE

The Attractor is activating! It's gonna go critical!
Also, his dog peed on the computer console.

> 
> [Physics please!]

It's a REALLY big ship

Entering station, Bloody, its crawling in enemies. But, they, seem to be ignoring me...Laythe! break off the attack, I have an idea!

- - - Updated - - -

Sending signal...adjusting frequency...
Focus all fire on that ship! All warheads launched, Phaser array concentrating fire, turrets armed, lasers firing
specifically, the one with billions of kitten pictures AND our scheduel
[Oh this IS gonna be a Borg thing! Darn! I already submitted my resume for the trash... OoO look it's a pepperoni...]

I'm hacking the station to restore power and life support.... Status?

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> [Oh this IS gonna be a Borg thing! Darn! I already submitted my resume for the trash... OoO look it's a pepperoni...]

Save me a pineapple!
be a borg, Xannari. Basically try to be a picard.

I've been hit! Shields 31%

- - - Updated - - -

Activating EMP gun.... It has no effect!
[but what will we call them? Hmm... Maybe like Krynn or something. That sounds cool. I need to think about this one]
grob?

Deep voice can be heard in all minds of those closely involved with Sampa:

Illusive Man, you have failed in your duties to protect thee, and then you return bringing a fleet...

Me: I had never abandoned my duties of protection, I chose a different path. I set up a blockade in an attempt to prevent others from nearing you.
